question: What do you think about social media for the student

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

What do you think about social media for the students?

I think social media can be good or bad for students. Social media is good for students if they are able to filter bad information for their benefits. But, social media is bad for students if they keep consuming hoax, hate speech and all those negative contents on social media. The choice is yours!

Penjelasan:

Aku berpendapat bahwa media sosial bisa baik atau buruk bagi para siswa. Media sosial baik untuk para siswa jika mereka mampu menyaring informasi buruk demi keuntungan mereka. Tetapi, media sosial buruk bagi para pelajar jika mereka terus mengkonsumsi hoax, ujaran kebencian dan semua konten negatif di media sosial. Pilihan ada padamu!

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
3. Ubah kata yang ada di dalam kurung sehingga menjadi conditional sentence type III yang benar!

“If we (know) about that earlier, we (not come) here.”
_
inappropriate answer will be reported, thank ya ~​

answers.answer:
Conditional Sentence Type 3 adalah suatu kondisi dimana suatu hal sudah tidak memungkinkan lagi untuk terjadi dikarenakan waktu kejadian sudah melampaui batas.

Contohnya : If you had remembered to invite me, I would have attended your party.

Rumus Conditional Sentence Type 3 :

If + Past Perfect + Would + Have + Past Participle.

Perubahan kata diatas menjadi Conditional Sentence Type 3 adalah :

If we had Known about that earlier, We Would'nt Have Come here.

Jawaban:

A rhyme is a repetition of similar sounds (usually, exactly the same sound) in the final stressed syllables and any following syllables of two or more words. Rhyming words have different beginning sounds, but have the same vowel and ending sounds, for example: cat/sat/pat/hat, spin/fin/chin/pin, etc.

Penjelasan:

Hope this helps sorry if I'm wrong.

Make it the smartest yes ;).

b. dancing
c. swimming
d. reading
molluan to the river to​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. reading

Penjelasan:

4. Tito ada di perpustakaan, hobinya adalah

d. membaca

Jawaban:

d. reading

library= perpustakaan.

Tito is in the library. His hobby is reading.

Tito berada di perpustakaan. Hobinya adalah membaca.

a, singing= bernyanyi

b. dancing= menari

c. swimming= berenang

related_questions.question: Bandingkan gambar diatas menggunakan teks bahasa Inggris koperatif dan superlatif!​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Degrees of Comparison:

1. A donkey is bigger than a turtle and a snail. (Comparative Degree)

2. A snail is smaller than a turtle and a donkey. (Comparative Degree)

3. The donkey has the biggest body in the picture. (Superlative Degree)

4. The snail is the smallest animal in the picture. (Superlative degree)

Penjelasan:

Comparative degree dibentuk dengan menambahkan akhiran "-er" dan menambahkan more ... than jika kata sifatnya terdiri lebih dari satu suku kata.

Contoh : Tony is younger than i am. (Tony lebih muda dariku)

I think Book A is more interesting than Book B.

Superlative degree dengan menambahkan akhiran "-est" the most jika kata sifat terdiri lebih dari 2 suku kata dan memiliki arti sebagai yang paling sehingga tidak bisa dibandingkan lagi.

Contoh : I am the youngest person in my family. (Aku adalah orang termuda / yang paling muda di dalam keluargaku)

Last night my brother told me the most interesting story that i have ever heard

Semoga membantu ya.
